name: Express
description: A good and functional Discord music and moderation bot in node.js.

TOKEN.description: The token of your Discord Bot

PREFIX.description: The prefix you want to use with the bot.

OWNERID.description: Your Discord user ID, needed for some commands...

HOST.description: Your Lavalink host that must have as port 80. If you don't have a Lavalink host, just leave the value as it is.

HOSTPASSW.description: Your Lavalink host password. If you don't have a Lavalink host, just leave the value as it is.
